system:
note description: "EiffelVision primitive, GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "primitive, base, widget" date: "$Date: 2016-09-27 08:50:48 -0700 (Tue, 27 Sep 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99192 $"
deferred class ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_primitive_i.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xmlEV_WIDGET_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_makemake end
../implementation_gtk/ev_tooltipable_imp.xmlEV_TOOLTIPABLE_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xmlEV_WIDGET_IMP} ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_initialize_tab_behaviorinitialize_tab_behavior end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_primitive.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE note option: stable attribute end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_update_for_pick_and_drop../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_update_for_pick_and_dropupdate_for_pick_and_drop (starting: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Pick and drop status has changed so update appearance of -- Current to reflect available targets. do end
feature -- Status report
f_is_tabable_to../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_tois_tabable_to: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current able to be tabbed to? do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_flagsgtk_widget_flags (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget) & {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_can_focus_enumgtk_can_focus_enum = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_can_focus_enumgtk_can_focus_enum end
f_is_tabable_from../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_fromis_tabable_from: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current able to be tabbed from?
f_enable_tabable_to../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_enable_tabable_toenable_tabable_to -- Make ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_tois_tabable_to True. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_set_flagsgtk_widget_set_flags (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_can_focus_enumgtk_can_focus_enum) end
f_disable_tabable_to../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_disable_tabable_todisable_tabable_to -- Make ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_tois_tabable_to False. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_unset_flagsgtk_widget_unset_flags (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_can_focus_enumgtk_can_focus_enum) end
f_enable_tabable_from../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_enable_tabable_fromenable_tabable_from -- Make ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_fromis_tabable_from True. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_fromis_tabable_from := True end
f_disable_tabable_from../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_disable_tabable_fromdisable_tabable_from -- Make ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_fromis_tabable_from False. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_fromis_tabable_from := False end
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_initialize_tab_behavior../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_initialize_tab_behaviorinitialize_tab_behavior -- Initialize tab behavior for Current. -- Called by initialize. do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_is_tabable_tois_tabable_to then ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_enable_tabable_fromenable_tabable_from end end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2014, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE_IMP
